Name: EntityId
Desc: MinQuantity

Name: Attack
Desc: Melee attack one or more enemies.

Name: Defend
Desc: Take half damage this turn if you get hit.

Name: Shoot
Desc: Attack one or more enemies that are out of melee range.

Name: Whirlwind
Desc: Hit one or more enemies in all groups within melee range.

Name: Volley
Desc: Hit one or more enemies in all groups with ranged damage.

Name: Hide
Desc: Meld into the shadows to allow next single target ability to crit.

Name: Charge
Desc: Passive buff to move the party forward more when advancing.

Name: Heal Wounds
Desc: Heal the wounds of an ally.

Name: Heal Party
Desc: Heal the wounds of all allies.

Name: Cure
Desc: Cure a single ally

Name: Cure Party
Desc: Cure all party members

Name: Town Portal
Desc: Teleport to a town on the overworld map.

Name: Phase Wall
Desc: Pass through a wall in front of you if the square behind it exists.

Name: Identify Item
Desc: Find out the stats an item has.

Name: Blink
Desc: Jump forward 1-9 squares if you are not impeded by anything.

Name: Teleport
Desc: Move to a different location in the current map.

Name: Beacon
Desc: Set a beacon or return to a location.

Name: Identify Monster
Desc: Get some information about a monster.

Name: Pick Lock
Desc: Open a locked door or chest.

Name: Cleanse Area
Desc: Disarm any traps nearby.

Name: Silence
Desc: Prevent a group from casting spells.

Name: Entangle
Desc: Prevent a group from use melee attacks.

Name: Weaken
Desc: Reduce the melee damage of a group of foes.

Name: Mesmerize
Desc: Make  group of enemies unable to act.

Name: Charm
Desc: Convince a monster to join your side.

Name: Sense Area
Desc: Determine if any traps or interesting things are nearby.

Name: Light
Desc: Create a light to let you see.

Name: Magic Compass
Desc: Gives you a compass.

Name: Levitate
Desc: Lets you float over many traps.

Name: Danger Sense
Desc: Alerts you to traps nearby.

Name: Mapping
Desc: Lets you map the area you're in.

Name: Batchspell
Desc: Casts all party buffs.

Name: Autoheal
Desc: Sometimes heals your party members.

Name: Barrier
Desc: Sometimes you avoid incoming damage.

Name: Thorns
Desc: Retaliate damage toward your attacker.

Name: Sharpshooter
Desc: Increases crit chance with ranged attacks.

Name: Lucky Blade
Desc: Increases luck extra hit bonus for melee attacks.

Name: Call Beast
Desc: Summon a beast.

Name: Conjure Golem
Desc: Summon a golem.

Name: Summon Elemental
Desc: Summon an elemental.

Name: Summon Monk
Desc: Summon a monk

Name: Summon Scrapper
Desc: Summon a scrapper

Name: Signal Thief
Desc: Signal a thief to follow you.

Name: Summon Skeleton
Desc: Summon a skeleton.

Name: Summon Vampire
Desc: Summon a Vampire

Name: Holy Beam
Desc: Hit one or more enemies with holy damage.

Name: Holy Nova
Desc: Hit all enemies in a group with holy damage.

Name: Holy Storm
Desc: Hit all enemies with holy damage.

Name: Fireball
Desc: Hit one or more enemies in a group with fire damage.

Name: Flamestrike
Desc: Hit all enemies in a group with fire damage.

Name: Firestorm
Desc: Hit all enemies with fire damage.

Name: Frostbolt
Desc: Hit one or more enemies in a group with cold damage.

Name: Cone of Cold
Desc: Hit all enemies in a group with cold damage.

Name: Blizzard
Desc: Hit all enemies with cold damage.

Name: Lightning Bolt
Desc: Hit one or more enemies with electric damage.

Name: Chain Lightning
Desc: Hit all enemies in a group with electric damage.

Name: Lightning Storm
Desc: Hit all enemies with electric damage.

Name: Poison Arrow
Desc: Hit one or more enemies with nature damage.

Name: Poison Spray
Desc: Hit all enemies in a group with nature damage.

Name: Plaguestorm
Desc: Hit all enemies with poisonous nature damage

Name: Arcane Missiles
Desc: Hit one or more enemies with arcane damage.

Name: Arcane Explosion
Desc: Hit all enemies in a group with arcane damage.

Name: Magestorm
Desc: Hit all enemies with arcane damage.

Name: Darkbolt
Desc: Hit one or more enemies with shadow damage.

Name: Shadow Burst
Desc: Hit all enemies in a group with shadow damage.

Name: Nightstorm
Desc: Hit all enemies with shadow damage.

Name: Shards
Desc: Hit one or more enemies with earthen shards.

Name: Groundburst
Desc: Hit all enemies in a group with earth damage.

Name: Earthquake
Desc: Hit all enemies with earth damage.

Name: Acid Bolt
Desc: Hit one or more enemies with acid.

Name: Acid Spray
Desc: Hit all enemies in a group with acid damage.

Name: Acidic Wave
Desc: Hit all enemies with acid damage.
